import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create multiple tags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tags/ids/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates multiple new tags in a single request, returning each created tag with its assigned TagId.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build an array of tag objects with the desired names and tag types.
2. Call [POST /api/v1.0/tags/ids/new](/docs/api/tags/create-tags) to create them in bulk.
3. Store the returned TagId values for downstream tagging operations.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Name, TagTypeId (per item)

**Note**: This API is deprecated. The route `/api/v1.0/tags/ids` (POST) also maps to this operation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"List of tags to create","items":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a tag.","properties":{"TagId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the tag. Required for updates, generated on create if not provided."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the tag"},"TagTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Type identifier for the tag (e.g., asset tag, ticket tag)"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for the tag. Null for district-wide tags."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product association for the tag"},"ScopeId":{"type":"string","description":"Scope identifier for the tag"}},"required":["Name","TagTypeId"],"title":"UpdateTagRequest"}},"example":[{"Name":"Asset Tag 1","TagTypeId":1,"ScopeId":"district"},{"Name":"Asset Tag 2","TagTypeId":1,"ScopeId":"district"}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

for successful create)","example":201},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that
